casebody.data:
James J. TAGLIA, as Trustee FOR the R. VICTOR TAGLIA 2010 IRREVOCABLE TRUST, Derivatively on behalf of Nominal Defendant, Sun West Acquisition Corporation, Petitioner,
v.
John Gary GRUBBS and Sun West Acquisition Corporation, Nominal Defendant, Respondents. Case No. 2D17-4480 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed June 20, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Denied.
